title: How to recover from LoadImageAndAuth Failed: Load Error
content:
After attempting to apply a factory image to 2 Pixel 2s I get the same error on reboot
is there a known solution to this problem?
I am a developer and have a known good system on a particular OS combination and was trying to reset devices back to that state and this is the error I get.

I think it is related to the devices auto-updating and now I am trying to go back.

Please help
